entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Showers or drizzle beginning overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
